ca.usask.simlab.odeToJava.util

Class Matrix

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.usask.simlab.odeToJava.util.Matrix

  • public class Matrix
extends java.lang.Object
    This class provides matrix functions that are not provided by JScience in order to support ODEToJava.
